title: A bill to provide for the expansion of the James Campbell National Wildlife Refuge, Honolulu County, Hawaii.
content: James Campbell National Wildlife Refuge Expansion Act of 2005 - Expands the boundary of the James Campbell National Wildlife Refuge (Refuge) in Honolulu, Hawaii, to include approximately 1,100 acres of land. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to: (1) acquire such land. And (2) make minor modifications to the boundary of the Refuge to achieve US Fish and Wildlife Service goals or to acquire property within the Refuge. Authorizes appropriations.
